sentences.en: At that moment a chime sounded from the front of the house.
sentences.cn: 就在那时，房前传来一声铃。

sentences.en: At this, some of the others chime in with memories of prewar deprivations.
sentences.cn: 听到这话，另外那些人中有几个开始加进来讲述他们对战前贫困生活的回忆。

sentences.en: Fleur, leaning out of her window, heard the hall clock's muffled chime of twelve.
sentences.cn: 芙雷身子探出窗外, 听见穿堂里的钟低沉地敲了十二点.

sentences.en: He heard the front doorbell chime.
He is always ready to chime in with his opinion.
sentences.cn: 他老是要打断别人的谈话发表自己的看法.

sentences.en: He is inclined to chime in when others speak.
sentences.cn: 人家说话时,他总是喜欢敲边鼓.

sentences.en: How I should chime in with their manners!
sentences.cn: 我多么应该和他们的风度东钟西应啊!

sentences.en: I thought they would chime in.
On Sundays we can hear the church bells chime.
sentences.cn: 星期日我们能听到教堂的钟声.

sentences.en: The chime of the clock woke him up.
The chime of the clock woke me.
sentences.cn: 时钟的声响把我吵醒了.

sentences.en: The clock in the hall chimed six.
The man's will was to do right , sure enough, but his heart didn't chime in.
sentences.cn: 这个人是想正经的, 这是毫无问题的, 可是他的心却不听话.

sentences.en: The president's remarks do not entirely chime with those coming from American and British politicians.
sentences.cn: 总统发表的讲话和美英政治家所说的不完全一致。

sentences.en: To chime the notes of his emotion, a verse mysteriously entered the correspondent's head.
sentences.cn: 为拨动思绪, 记者的脑海里莫名其妙地浮现出一首诗.

words.tran_cn: 钟声；一套发谐音的钟；和谐

trans.tran_cn: 合奏钟声，钟乐，谐音，韵律，和谐，[航]甲板上的沟
trans.tran_en: a ringing sound made by a bell or clock
if a bell or clock chimes, it makes a ringing sound, especially to tell you what time it is

trans.tran_cn: 敲出和谐的乐声，报时，机械地重复，合节奏
